item.title: The Problem
item.description: The problem. As a IT Solutions vendor, I need my own branded products that are low cost to deploy in order to make any money!

item.title: our solution
item.description: OpenB.Net Platform as a Service - Your very own Cloud Infrastructure a docker based infrastructure management system thatâ€™s easy to use. OpenB.net provides a full set of infrastructure services for containers, including networking, storage services, host management, load balancing and more. these services work across any infrastructure, and make it simple to reliably deploy and manage applications. Happier devs. Happier ops. DevOps teams are often the first group that implement openb within an organization.
